summary: SummaryEstée Lauder Nighttime Experts Skincare Set is a great gift set including a full-size Advanced Night Repair Serum. Wake up to skin that looks like you got 8 hours of beauty sleep even if you didn't.
details: DetailsIncludesAdvanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex, full-size (1.0 oz)Advanced Night Repair Eye Supercharged Gel-Creme Synchronized Multi-Recovery, deluxe travel size (0.17 oz)Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Creme, deluxe travel size (0.5 oz)BenefitsMeet your nighttime experts including a full size Advanced Night Repair, to reduce the look of lines and wrinkles and reveal beautiful, healthy-looking skin. Wake up to skin that looks radiant and plumped with hydration - like you got 8 hours of beauty sleep even if you didn't.Over time, Advanced Night Repair Eye Supercharged Gel-Creme significantly reduces the look of lines, wrinkles, undereye puffiness and dark circles.Advanced Night Repair Serum helps skin look smoother and less lined, younger, more radiant and even toned.With continued use, Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Moisturizer plumps, hydrates and ignites firming power, night after night.Item 2643391How To UseStep 1: Apply Advanced Night Repair Eye Supercharged GelCreme AM and PM around eye area.Step 2: Apply Advanced Night Repair Serum AM and PM on clean skin before your moisturizer.Step 3: At night, apply Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Moisturizer all over face and neck.IngredientsSee product packaging for complete ingredient listing.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Step 1: Apply Advanced Night Repair Eye Supercharged GelCreme AM and PM around eye area.Step 2: Apply Advanced Night Repair Serum AM and PM on clean skin before your moisturizer.Step 3: At night, apply Revitalizing Supreme+ Night Power Bounce Moisturizer all over face and neck.

media.headline: Wake Up to Radiant, Revitalized Skin
media.caption: Trio

media.headline: Soft, Glowy Skin from This 3-Step Night Routine
media.caption: Luxury skincare

faceoff_positive.comments: I have been using this Nighttime Experts Skincare set for a few weeks and I now understand why Advanced Night Repair (or "ANR" as I've learned) has a cult following. I use the Night Repair Eye Lift + Sculpt eye cream at night and I'm a big fan of it, but I hadn't tried any other Estee Lauder products yet. The nighttime experts set has three components--Advanced Night Repair serum, an ANR eye cream, and a Bounce cream. The serum is lightweight and non-greasy and has a very pleasant light citrus scent. I have sensitive skin and can't do a lot of retinol, so I was very happy to read this product relies on hyaluronic acid and peptides. After a few weeks of use, my forehead wrinkles are GONE. I'm not even joking. I wish I had taken a before picture. Granted, they weren't deep lines to begin with because I'm only 32 and wear sunscreen, but they are invisible now and I totally credit the ANR. I always let that dry before I apply the Bounce cream. The texture reminds me of Ponds mixed with Cool Whip. It's pretty light as well. The ANR eye cream is more like a gel, which could be good for the summer, but I prefer a creamier eye cream for lots of added moisture. My skin is always glowing after I apply these products at night. For a few seconds I pretend I'm as moisturized and as smooth as JLo, and then one of my kids starts crying and I remember I don't have her six pack abs. Overall, I'm a huge fan of Estee Lauder's night products now and will continue using them in the future (particularly the ANR). I received this product for free from Estee Lauder for testing and review purposes.
faceoff_positive.headline: New devoted fan of Advanced Night Repair

faceoff_negative.comments: The serum and face cream in this set made my skin fell soft, plump and hydrated. I have oily, dehydrated skin, it's nice walking up to non-greasy skin. I also work overnights and don't always get a good sleep, but this serum helps me look like I'm well rested. However, the eye cream in this set gave me a chemical burn on the outer corner of my eye, near top inner corner above eyelid, and caused crusty dry skin under my eye. Thus making my fine lines appear worse.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice serum, bad eye cream
